data.title: Super Star KRISHNA SPECIAL
data.text:
NSK already has many credits to his name. One more feather in his cap. That's not a small issue. Acting in 100 titlerole films is not a mean thing. I think probably it is a world record.

NSK IS THE ONLY TOP HERO TO

ACT AS HERO IN MORE THAN 300 FILMS (TI record)

ACT IN, AT LEAST ONE FILM A YEAR, CONTINUOUSLY FOR MORE THAN 43 YEARS (TI Record)

ACT IN 18 FILMS IN A CALENDAR YEAR (1972)

ACT IN 16 COLOR FILMS IN A CALENDAR YEAR (1980)

ACT IN 9 TITLE ROLE FILMS IN A CALENDAR YEAR (1980)

ACT IN 100 FILMS IN JUST EIGHT AND HALF YEARS (FROM 101ST FILM(MANUSHULU MATTIBOMMALU (MAY 1974) TO 200TH FILM EENAADU(DEC 1982)

PRODUCE HIGHEST NUMBER OF FILMS

AND MANY MORE...

Courtesy:Mr.Vijay

SAAKSHI

Release date: July 1, 1967

Banner: Nandana Films

Director: Bapu

Heroine: Vijayanirmala

Music director: K.V. Mahadevan

Director of photography: Selvaraj

Distributors:

Andhra: Sri Films

Nizam: Sri Films

Ceded: ?

FIRST RELEASE CENTERS

Vijayawada – Sri Lakshmi - 40

Guntur – Srinivasa

Hyderabad – Dilshad - 28

Secunderabad – Alankar - 21

Warangal – Durgakalamandir - 21

CREDITS:

Saakshi can be said as the first art film in Telugu film industry.

Saakshi is also the first film to be shot in outdoor completely.

Saakshi is the first film of hero Krishna which was selected as the best film (by Madras Film Fans for the year 1967).

Saakshi was exhibited in the Moscow Film Festival in the year 1968.

Saakshi is the first film of director Bapu.

Saakshi is the first film of hero Krishna with Vijaya Nirmala.

In my view, Saakshi is the best film of hero Krishna and his innocent smile in the film will haunt the viewer for a long time.
